Plot features

plot_features.Rd

Plot features

plot_features(
  object,
  geom,
  x = subgroup,
  fill = subgroup,
  color = subgroup,
  ...,
  fixed = list(na.rm = TRUE),
  theme = list(axis.text.x = element_blank(), axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank())
)

plot_feature_boxplots(...)

plot_feature_profiles(...)

Arguments

object

SummarizedExperiment
geom

geom_point, geom_boxplot, etc.
x

svar mapped to x
fill

svar mapped to fill
color

svar mapped to color
...

mapped aesthetics
fixed

fixed aesthetics
theme

ggplot theme specifications

Value

ggplot object

Examples

require(magrittr)
file <- download_data('halama18.metabolon.xlsx')
object <- read_metabolon(file, plot = FALSE)

#> 	Read: ~/importomicscache/datasets/halama18/halama18.metabolon.xlsx
#> 		Guess replicate values from sampleids: UT_h10_R1 => R1
#> 		Log2 transform
object %<>% pca()

#> 	Add PCA
#> 		Retain 391/391 features: non-zero, non-NA, and non-NaN for some sample
idx <- order(abs(fdata(object)$pca1), decreasing=TRUE)[1:9]
object %<>% extract(idx, )
plot_feature_boxplots(object)

#> 		Remove clashing svars/fvars: pca1, pca2
plot_feature_profiles(object)

#> 		Remove clashing svars/fvars: pca1, pca2
